OldMapIdByName Class Reference

Class used by both MapModule and GenereateMapServer for map generation specific tasks. More...

    Stores map ID and handled status, mapped to map name.
  • MC2String m_fileName
    This is the file name of the file used for storing the content of this object.

Detailed Description

Class used by both MapModule and GenereateMapServer for map generation specific tasks.

NB. This class is not thread safe.

Definition at line 29 of file OldMapIdByName.h.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef map< MC2String, pair< uint32, bool> > OldMapIdByName::mapIdAndHdlByName_t
 

Stores underview map name as key mapped to underview map ID and a bool telling if the map has been handled as value.

An underview map has been handled when its data has been added to an overview.

Definition at line 37 of file OldMapIdByName.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OldMapIdByName::OldMapIdByName (  MC2String  fileName  ) 
 

Creates an OldMapIdByName object.

Parameters:
fileName The file name used when reading and writing map ID by map name file.

Member Function Documentation

bool OldMapIdByName::cmpUndIDsWithMapFiles (  MC2String  mapPath,
uint32 &  highestID,
uint32 &  nextMapID
) 
 

Compare the underview IDs stored in this object with the underview maps stored in mapPath and make sure no overview maps are present in mapPath directory.

Parameters:
mapPath The directory where the underview maps to compare with are stored.
highestID Outparameter The highest map ID found in mapIdAndHdlByName.
nextMapID Outparameter The next available map ID in mapPath.
Returns:
True if the underview IDs in mapIdAndHdlByName are exactly the same as the unverview maps stored in mapPath. Otherwise false. Also returns false if overview maps exists in mapPath directory.

bool OldMapIdByName::fileExists (   ) 
 

Returns:
True if the map ID by map name file exists on disc. Otherwise false.

mapIdAndHdlByName_t& OldMapIdByName::getWriteableMapIdByAndHdlName (   ) 
 

Returns:
Returns a writeable structure reprecenting the content of the file storing map ID by map name. Set a referens variable to the returned structure and edit the content of it to influence what is written in the file.

bool OldMapIdByName::initAndWriteFile (  MC2String  mapPath  ) 
 

Inits internal map ID by map name from maps found in mapPath.

All handled status is set to false. Writes the result to disc in a file.

Parameters:
mapPath Place to load maps from.
Returns:
True if successful otherwise false.

bool OldMapIdByName::overviewsContained (   ) 
 

Tells whether the objcet contains overview maps.

Returns:
True if overview maps are contained, otherwise false.

bool OldMapIdByName::readFile (   ) 
 

Reads the content of the map ID by map name file and inits the object with its content.

Returns:
True if successful otherwise false.

bool OldMapIdByName::writeFile (   ) 
 

Writes the content of this object in a file.

Returns:
True if successful otherwise false.
